DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial Phase 2 , multicenter , placebo-controlled , double-blind , parallel-arm study evaluate efficacy safety High Strength Cranberry ( 500mg Pacran® ) prevent UTI ( cystitis ) woman history recurrent UTI ( rUTI ) .
DOC.brief_title: High Strength Cranberry Supplementation Prevention Recurrent Urinary Tract Infection
DOC.criteria: 1 . Females age 1865 year , inclusive 2 . A history recurrent urinary tract infection define ≥3 UTIs last year OR least 2 UTIs occur last 6 month . Each infection require confirmation health professional least one infection confirm culture . 3 . Willing answer questionnaire comply study requirement 4 . Ability swallow capsule 5 . Provided Written Informed Consent 1 . Microbial growth urine culture ≥107 cfu/L ( 104cfu/mL ) within 7 day Day 1 2 . A history > 5 UTIs last 6 month ( confirm selfreport health professional ) 3 . Use antibiotic antibiotic prophylaxis within 28 day Day 1 4 . Use antibacterial product , opinion Medical Investigator may interfere study outcome , within 28 day Day 1 5 . Regular use Vaccinium containing product ( e.g . form blueberry , cranberry , bilberry , lingonberry , etc i.e fruit , dry fruit , pill , juice supplement ) within 28 day Day 1 discretion Medical Investigator 6 . Presence intermittent indwell urinary catheter 7 . Anatomical abnormality urinary tract
